output: html_document
---
Gebruik [inbo/vespawatchr](https://github.com/inbo/iassetR) to get nesten 
from iasset API.

```{r install/update iassetR}
library(devtools)

install_github("inbo/iassetR@main")
```

Sometimes it can be neccesary to test new "developmental" iassetR features.
This can be done using the chunck below. 
```{r install alternate version, eval = FALSE}
remove.packages("iassetR")

install_github("Turtle6665/iassetR@31-get_record()-doesn't-give-an-ID-for-each-observation")
```

```{r libraries}
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(iassetR)
```

```{r get records}
iasset_raw <- get_records(inspection_name = "Vespa-Watch",
                          get_access_token(Sys.getenv("iasset_user")))
```

```{r drop columns}
iasset_clean <- iasset_raw %>% 
  select(-naam, 
         -telefoon,
         -e_mailadres) %>% 
  write_csv2("./data/input/Vespa-Watch_iasset.csv")
```
